article.title: SRA Awarded $25 Million Contract by Department of Homeland Security
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: SRA International Incorporated has been awarded a contract with the Department of Homeland Security's Office of Emergency Communications (OEC). The contract is valued at more than $25 million if all options are exercised. Under this contract, SRA will provide the OEC with strategic and project management consulting services, including governance development, communications and outreach, performance management, organizational strategy and policy analysis.
